Articles.Content:
Watching the DSCOVR launch live stream and the first piece of music they used was KSP's space theme.

Going on right now btw. This one they have a good chance of doing the KSP rocket landing.

Edward
KSP's music was composed by Kevin Macleod, which is royalty free and the reason why SQUAD used it for KSP.

Kevin MacLeod has an absolute boatload of royalty-free music out there, however the tune they used was not a MacLeod track.

Not sure of the title, but it's one of Victor Machado's tracks, apparently.
I saw a presentation at Princeton and three songs used in the video were in KSP, though I doubt they were there because of the game.

It's common knowledge that Elon Musk loves playing KSP, so I assumed the music was a shout out to the community.

Best,

-Slashy
